Text: Why is this in the porn section?
anyone know why there are strange links to french car insurance websites in my footer?

whoever uploaded this torrent put a function in the footer to add a link to some bogus webpage. 

even worse, it's all in base64. pretty clever, but you didn't fool me! ha!

For Those Who dont know, The Themes have a footer encoded in Base64.

Simple enough to decode, but not many know how.

This torrent should make you extremely nervous. For one thing, all of these themes attempt to call the mother ship. Secondly, they've obviously been tampered with. This torrent contains links to external sites not in the original files. No telling what else you're giving it access to when you put it on your server. Be careful, and be smart before you go putting something like this on your server.
